Name: Reflect Type
Effect: Target Self. Change the User's Type to match the one(s) of a foe. (i.e. Staryu is battling vs Charizard, their type will become Fire/Flying instead of Water) Whole Scene Duration or until this Move is used again.
Description: The Pok√©mon is able to rewrite their own cellular composition at will to match that of potential predators. Increasing chances of survival.
